title: This Valentine’s Day eve, let's look at ways ‘couplepreneurs’ manage their personal finances - Moneycontrol.com
content: This Valentine’s Day eve, let's look at ways ‘couplepreneurs’ manage their personal finances  Moneycontrol.com
description: MobiKwik, CashKaro and EarnKaro founders are couples who decided to walk together on their career journeys, in addition to their life journeys. Now they’ve got their home finances and work finances to manage. And striking that balance is not always easy.
